entry.title: WIND WARNING , Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:45 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 8:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: WNW 62 km/h gust 76 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 7:48 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:48 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:48 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
